attributes.action: Increase Finance to Pet Charitys to stop animal abuse.
attributes.additional_details:
RSPCA require finance.
Dog's Trust require finance.
Blue Cross require finance.
Etc.
attributes.background:
In the UK alone, there has been a growing report in numbers of animal cruelty. Most charities are trying to stop this but don't have the finance to stop this. They need the finance to support every neglected pet in the UK.

All Pets are Everyone's Best Friend.
